title: Best of Late Night: Comics talk Turkey, Trump and the Kurds
text:
CLOSE The late-night comics sound off on President trump and his promises to Turkey. Mike Thompson, Detroit Free Press

Trump, Turkey and Kurds: Late-night comics put Trump's latest craziness into perspective

Do you find Turkey hard to digest?

And by Turkey, I mean the controversy surrounding President Donald Trump's baffling decision to pull troops from northern Syria and make room for our NATO ally Turkey to fill the void? If you find complicated geopolitics hard to swallow, allow our late-night comedians to make the latest headlines from Turkey more palatable.

Trevor Noah kicks off your Turkey tutorial with a celestial analogy that exposes the craziness of Trump's actions. Jimmy Fallon expertly serves up a Turkish delight and Stephen Colbert offers an unusual suggestion for how the Kurds can get back on Trump's good side.

Trevor Noah attends the 2019 Time 100 Gala on April 23 in New York. (Photo: Charles Sykes/Invision/AP)

Take a look at our top picks from this weekend's late-night lineup, then vote for yours in the poll below.
